column6: As Figment and Dreamfinder adapt to their new time period, a shadowy threat emerges...and you'll never guess its origin! Steampunk adventure and modern technology clash with unexpected results! Don't miss the next installment of the sequel to the fan-favorite, sell-out miniseries! Elements based on Figment Â© Disney
column8: | artist:Ramon Bachs | penciller (cover):John Tyler Christopher | writer:Jim Zub
